Section 1 Definitions
1.1 Conditions Precedent. Conditions precedent to initial borrowing include delivery of constitutional documents and officer certificates.

Section 2 Representations
2.1 Representations and Warranties. The Borrower represents and warrants due organization, authority, and enforceability.

Section 3 Payment Mechanics
3.1 Payment Terms. Principal and accrued interest rate amounts are payable monthly; prepayment is permitted subject to fees.

Section 4 Covenants
4.1 Financial Covenants. Borrower shall maintain leverage ratio and debt service coverage ratio thresholds.

Section 5 Security
5.1 Collateral and Security Interest. Borrower grants a first priority security interest and lien over collateral.

Section 6 Defaults
6.1 Events of Default. Non-payment, covenant breach, and cross default trigger acceleration remedies.

Section 7 Governing Law
7.1 Governing Law and Venue. This Agreement is governed by New York law and venue.

Section 8 Guarantee
8.1 Guarantee. Parent provides an unconditional guarantee of borrower obligations.
